title: Best Slow Cooker Indian Recipes
description: Try one of these top-rated Indian slow cooker recipes, for both vegetarians and meat-lovers alike, to see just what we mean.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 10 Best Slow Cooker Indian Recipes By Hayley Sugg Updated on November 30, 2021 Close Credits: Kim's Cooking Now Indian food is full of deep flavor thanks to abundant spices. By making Indian dishes in the slow cooker, everything from curries to korma are improved by the long process of simmering and infusing. Try one of these 10 Indian slow cooker recipes, for both vegetarians and meat-lovers alike, to see just what we mean. 01 of 11 Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Tikka Masala View Recipe Save Hey Gil Tikka masala, which is a very popular dish in the United Kingdom, features chicken cooked until tender in a creamy tomato sauce. Some reviewers found success substituting coconut milk for the heavy cream. 02 of 11 Spicy Beef Curry Stew for the Slow Cooker View Recipe Save chibi chef This international twist on beef stew is Indian-inspired. Tomatoes, onions, and ginger make the savory base, while a dash of curry powder and peppers add some depth. 03 of 11 Indian Chicken Korma in the Slow Cooker View Recipe Save Linda T Korma is traditionally made by braising meat and spices in yogurt or cream to achieve a thick sauce. Here, the slow cooker does the majority of the work, resulting in a creamy dish that rivals your favorite restaurant. Best part? It tastes even better the next day when flavors are allowed to meld. 04 of 11 Slow Cooker Vegetarian Curry View Recipe Save Kim's Cooking Now This mildly spiced vegetarian curry is perfect for picky eaters who need a tamped down dish to introduce them to Indian cooking. If you're looking for more heat or depth, add extra dashes of your favorite Indian spice mixes, like garam masala or sambar powder. 05 of 11 Keon's Slow Cooker Curry Chicken View Recipe Save Rock_lobster Shortcuts are the name of the game with this ultra easy curried recipe. Soup mix and condensed soups combine with traditional Indian ingredients to create a fusion dish that's sure to please the whole family. "I love curry and this turned out very good," says landlinsf. "My guests couldn't believe how it was made." 06 of 11 Slow Cooker Chai View Recipe Save A lovely (and spicy) change from hot chocolate, this slow cooker chai tea recipe will warm you right up. "This is the only tea I drink now," says Susan. "This recipe is so good I make it every week or so, depending on when I run out." 07 of 11 Slow Cooker Butter Chicken View Recipe Save mcalbert Using two types of masala and two types of curry (powder and paste), this slow cooker butter chicken is infused with flavor throughout. Reviewer Eric says, "Exceptional flavor and a wonderfully easy recipe." 08 of 11 Easy Indian Curried Lamb View Recipe Save valerie While the directions for this curried lamb are for making it on the stovetop, recipe creator mn says that the curry can also be made in the slow cooker on low for 6 to 8 hours. "Great recipe!" says reviewer Fabian&Don. "The lamb was VERY tender and the spices were a perfect blend." 09 of 11 Delightful Indian Coconut Vegetarian Curry in the Slow Cooker View Recipe Save Maeve Hilleary Ball Vegetables are simmered for hours in a curried coconut sauce to achieve this delicious dinner. Mix and match what veggies you have on-hand (or what's in season) before serving over rice or with naan bread. 10 of 11 Indian Spiced Chicken View Recipe Save bfr610 Chicken and cauliflower pair together to create a balanced meal in this slow cooker curry. The recipe creator suggests serving it with a little yogurt and a few lemon wedges on the side for dressing the dish up. 11 of 11 State of Home Cooking: Appetite for Adventure and Cultural Heritage We're serving up and celebrating the biggest home-cooking trends from the most enthusiastic cooks we know: our community. We crunched the data from 1.2 billion annual Allrecipes.com visits and 2.5 billion annual page views. Then we dug even further, surveying Allrecipes cooks about what's in their carts and fridges, on their stovetops and tables, and on their minds. Appetite for Adventure and Cultural Heritage is just one of the topics they're most curious about. Explore more: Recipes Global Cuisines Asian Indian Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! Other Submit You’ll Also Love Slow Cooker Chicken Tikka Masala 57 Ratings Instant Pot Apple Mango Chutney 2 Ratings Mutton Varuval (Malaysian Indian-Style Goat Curry) 4 Ratings Indian-Spiced Baked Fish Indian Chicken Korma in the Slow Cooker 12 Ratings Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Tikka Masala 144 Ratings Slow-Cooked Chicken Biryani 4 Ratings Slow Cooker Chai 39 Ratings Slow Cooker Chicken Jalfrezi 4 Ratings Indian Pizza 2 Ratings Mild Coconut Chicken Curry with Sweet Potato 1 Rating Vegan Japanese Turnip Curry 1 Rating Quick Indian Vegetarian Cottage Cheese Breakfast 3 Ratings Slow Cooker Mild Curry Split Black Lentils 1 Rating Our 11 Best Indian Street Food Snacks, Appetizers, and Small Bites Indian Curry Couscous with Broccoli and Edamame 8 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
